```{r setup}
library(cardinalR)
library(langevitour)
```

```{r}
sphere_data <- sphere(radius = 1, resolution = 20, num_noise_dims = 2, 
                      min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

colnames(sphere_data) <- paste0("x", 1:NCOL(sphere_data))

langevitour(sphere_data, pointSize = 2)
```

```{r}
diff_sphere_data <- small_big_sphere_with_noise(sample_size = 650, 
                                                num_noise_dims = 2, 
                                                min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

colnames(diff_sphere_data) <- paste0("x", 1:NCOL(diff_sphere_data))

langevitour(diff_sphere_data, pointSize = 2)
```
